titleStmt.title: To his reverend and much respected good friend, Mr. John Goodwin: be these I pray presented.
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
Taylor, Daniel, ca. 1614-1655.

notesStmt.note: Includes: Taylor, Daniel. To his much respected friend Mr. Iohn Vicars [signed on page 8: D.T.].
Annotation on Thomason copy: on page 1: "feb: 11th 1644"; on page 8: "Dan: Taylor".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
